has a lot to overcome. A poll taken for The Hollywood Reporter shows that " Ben Roethlisberger " is the most disliked player in today's game. The good news for him: Despite what Sports Illustrated described as repulsive behavior, the ultimate expression of athletic entitlement run amok, Ben Roethlisberger is not the most disliked player in the league. I'm definitely enjoying the weather. I'm about to hit the golf course right now, so we've got to cut the interviews short, he said. Things seem to be turning around for Michael Vick off the field as well. He just signed his first paid endorsement contract since his release from prison. is stepping down as CEO of Google, and Larry Page is taking over the company just announced in target="_blank" its earnings release.
